item.title: Mindy add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Mindy add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Mindy add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Mindy add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "That which does not kill us makes us stronger." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Mindy add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Mindy add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Mindy add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Mindy add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "If you judge people, you have no time to love them." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Mindy add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "Listen to the mustn'ts, child. Listen to the don'ts. Listen to the shouldn'ts, the impossibles, the won'ts. Listen to the never haves, then listen close to me... Anything can happen, child. Anything can be." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Mindy add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Mindy add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "You may say I'm a dreamer, but I'm not the only one. I hope someday you'll join us. And the world will live as one." -- John Lennon

item.title: Mindy add a quote by Alfred Lord Tennyson
item.description: "Tis better to have loved and lost Than never to have loved at all." -- Alfred Lord Tennyson

item.title: Mindy add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Life is an opportunity, benefit from it. Life is beauty, admire it. Life is a dream, realize it. Life is a challenge, meet it. Life is a duty, complete it. Life is a game, play it. Life is a promise, fulfill it. Life is sorrow, overcome it. Life is a song, sing it. Life is a struggle, accept it. Life is a tragedy, confront it. Life is an adventure, dare it. Life is luck, make it. Life is too precious, do not destroy it. Life is life, fight for it." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Mindy add a quote by Sophie Kinsella
item.description: "sometimes you don't need a goal in life, you don't need to know the big picture. you just need to know what you're going to do next!" -- Sophie Kinsella

item.title: Mindy add a quote by Garrison Keillor
item.description: "A book is a gift you can open again and again." -- Garrison Keillor

item.title: Mindy add a quote by Louis de Bernières
item.description: "Women only nag when they feel unappreciated." -- Louis de Bernières

item.title: Mindy add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "Sometimes when you pick up your child you can feel the map of your own bones beneath your hands, or smell the scent of your skin in the nape of his neck. This is the most extraordinary thing about motherhood - finding a piece of yourself separate and apart that all the same you could not live without." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Mindy add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "Maybe who we are isn't so much about what we do, but rather what we're capable of when we least expect it." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Mindy add a quote by Torey Hayden
item.description: "Perhaps the greatest magic of the human spirit is the ability to laugh, at ourselves, at each other, and at our sometimes hopeless situation. Laughter normalized our lives" -- Torey Hayden

item.title: Mindy add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Mindy add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Mindy add a quote by Robert Townsend
item.description: "True leadership must be for the benefit of the followers, not the enrichment of the leaders." -- Robert Townsend

item.title: Mindy add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You're off to Great Places! Today is your day! Your mountain is waiting, So... get on your way!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Mindy add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Today was good. Today was fun. Tomorrow is another one." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Mindy add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose. You're on your own. And you know what you know. And YOU are the one who'll decide where to go..." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Mindy add a quote by Kent M. Keith
item.description:
"The Paradoxical Commandments
People are illogical, unreasonable, and self-centered. Love them anyway.
If you do good, people will accuse you of selfish ulterior motives. Do good anyway.
If you are successful, you will win false friends and true enemies. Succeed anyway.
The good you do today will be forgotten tomorrow. Do good anyway.
Honesty and frankness make you vulnerable. Be honest and frank anyway.
The biggest men and women with the biggest ideas can be shot down by the smallest men and women with the smallest minds. Think big anyway.
People favor underdogs but follow only top dogs. Fight for a few underdogs anyway.
What you spend years building may be destroyed overnight. Build anyway.
People really need help but may attack you if you do help them. Help people anyway.
Give the world the best you have and you'll get kicked in the teeth. Give the world the best you have anyway." -- Kent M. Keith

item.title: Mindy add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Mindy add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "Death ends a life, not a relationship." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Mindy add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "There are five people you meet in heaven. Each of us was in your life for a reason. You may not have known the reason at the time, and that is what heaven is for. For understanding your life on earth. This is the greatest gift God can give you: to understand what happened in your life. To have it explained. It is the peace you have been searching for." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Mindy add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "A person's a person, no matter how small." -- Dr. Seuss
